name: latroP
description:
latroP is a puzzle game where you find yourself in a science base but no memory.

Complete simulations and find your memories and why you are here.

============================================

-CONTROLS-

-Mouse left click for open first portal

-Mouse right click open second portal

-Keyboard space button for jump

-"ESC" or "P" for pause

-Keyboard "E" for interact with Texts.

-"WASD" for movement.

============================================

-FEATURES-

-The game will feature 3 levels.

-Gameplay

  • You will spawn at the "start point" of the maps.
  • Objective is to reach end of the map.
  • You have to find your way through jumping puzzles

-Levels

  • Main Menu
  1. Main Menu is fully interactable and a gate between other levels.
  2. You can start playing by "get close enough to texts and press E".
  • Tutorial
  1. Tutorial level is a free roam level that helps you to understand game mechanics and movement physics.
  • First Level
  1. This is where the fun begins.
  2. You have to find the broken water tank in order to finish first simulation.
  3. There are a lot of jumping puzzle challenge for you to finish.
  4. And yes you can break the game!!! (Early Dev)
